actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to repeal the statutes relating to the issuance of cotton acreage and production reports.

summary.text: Repeals the statutes requiring (1) the issuance of monthly cotton crop reports from August to December and (2) acreage reports in July, August, and December. (Repeals 7 U.S.C. 475, 476)

titles.title: A bill to repeal the statutes relating to the issuance of cotton acreage and production reports.
